about_the_game:
Get ready for a blast from the past!

Step into the driver’s seat in Saturday Night Racing, an adrenaline-pumping arcade-style racer inspired by the golden age of 1990s American stock car racing and the exciting, chaotic world of local short track racing. Rev your engines, dust off those fenders, and prepare to tear up the track!

  • Classic Stock Car Action: Feel the rush of competitive oval racing, with high-powered stock cars, roaring engines, and thrilling wheel-to-wheel action. No fancy gadgets, just pure racing.

  • Tight, Action-Packed Tracks: Featuring 7 asphalt and concrete ovals, take on a variety of track layouts where every move counts. The close quarters racing means there’s no room for mistakes—bump, jostle, and push your way to the front.

  • Fast Paced, No-Nonsense Racing: Forget the long, drawn-out sim races. In Saturday Night Racing, it’s all about quick, intense, and exhilarating sprints. Hit the track, get your heart racing, and see who comes out on top.

Game Features:

  • Online Time Trials & Leaderboards: Challenge yourself and race against the clock in online time trials! Compete for the fastest lap on each track and climb the global leaderboards. See how your skills stack up against the best racers in the world and try to beat their times!

  • Race Now & Trial Modes: Jump into the action with Race Now, where you can select your driver and track for instant, no-fuss racing. Or use Online Trials to fine-tune your skills and master each track at your own pace.

  • Steam Achievements: Unlock a variety of Steam achievements as you conquer podiums, set new lap records, and dominate the tracks. Show off your racing prowess and collect them all!

  • Steam Deck Optimization: Resolution and graphics options are configured to allow a smooth gameplay experience on the Steam Deck. Use of trackpads is required to navigate game menus.

  • Difficulty Settings & AI Optimization: Tailor the experience to your abilities with 3 difficulty levels, 2 tire grip settings, and driver assist toggle. Race against the AI opponents who will alter their racing lines, draft, and lift for the player accordingly.
detailed_description:
Get ready for a blast from the past!

Step into the driver’s seat in Saturday Night Racing, an adrenaline-pumping arcade-style racer inspired by the golden age of 1990s American stock car racing and the exciting, chaotic world of local short track racing. Rev your engines, dust off those fenders, and prepare to tear up the track!

  • Classic Stock Car Action: Feel the rush of competitive oval racing, with high-powered stock cars, roaring engines, and thrilling wheel-to-wheel action. No fancy gadgets, just pure racing.

  • Tight, Action-Packed Tracks: Featuring 7 asphalt and concrete ovals, take on a variety of track layouts where every move counts. The close quarters racing means there’s no room for mistakes—bump, jostle, and push your way to the front.

  • Fast Paced, No-Nonsense Racing: Forget the long, drawn-out sim races. In Saturday Night Racing, it’s all about quick, intense, and exhilarating sprints. Hit the track, get your heart racing, and see who comes out on top.

Game Features:

  • Online Time Trials & Leaderboards: Challenge yourself and race against the clock in online time trials! Compete for the fastest lap on each track and climb the global leaderboards. See how your skills stack up against the best racers in the world and try to beat their times!

  • Race Now & Trial Modes: Jump into the action with Race Now, where you can select your driver and track for instant, no-fuss racing. Or use Online Trials to fine-tune your skills and master each track at your own pace.

  • Steam Achievements: Unlock a variety of Steam achievements as you conquer podiums, set new lap records, and dominate the tracks. Show off your racing prowess and collect them all!

  • Steam Deck Optimization: Resolution and graphics options are configured to allow a smooth gameplay experience on the Steam Deck. Use of trackpads is required to navigate game menus.

  • Difficulty Settings & AI Optimization: Tailor the experience to your abilities with 3 difficulty levels, 2 tire grip settings, and driver assist toggle. Race against the AI opponents who will alter their racing lines, draft, and lift for the player accordingly.
name: Saturday Night Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (or newer)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (or newer)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
